display.title: Acquire: dml-refabricated:trial_keystone
description: The Trial Key used in the crafting has no effect, so I's suggest you to use an Unbound one to avoid loosing your precious data.
After you have one, put it in a good location in the world and start getting ready for your fight.
Before getting into the fight, I'd like to present to you who you gonna fight:
> The System Glitch is a pretty strong mob, its life will vary depending of the tier of the Trial you are running. He is also pretty fast, and will be teleporting and tricking you.
To get started, get a bound Trial Key and click in the Trial Keystone!
